static string Aurora.Framework.Extentions.AppendQuery ( this Uri  uri,
string  query 
) [static]

Appends a query string to a Uri that may or may not have existing query parameters.

Parameters:
uri Uri to append the query to
query Query string to append. Can either start with ? or just containg key/value pairs
Returns:
String representation of the Uri with the query string appended

summary> /summary> param name = "collection">

param name = "key">

returns>

static Uri Aurora.Framework.Extentions.Combine ( this Uri  uri,
string  fragment 
) [static]

Combines a Uri that can contain both a base Uri and relative path with a second relative path fragment.

Parameters:
uri Starting (base) Uri
fragment Relative path fragment to append to the end of the Uri
Returns:
The combined Uri

This is similar to the Uri constructor that takes a base Uri and the relative path, except this method can append a relative path fragment on to an existing relative path

static Uri Aurora.Framework.Extentions.Combine ( this Uri  uri,
Uri  fragment 
) [static]

Combines a Uri that can contain both a base Uri and relative path with a second relative path fragment. If the fragment is absolute, it will be returned without modification.

Parameters:
uri Starting (base) Uri
fragment Relative path fragment to append to the end of the Uri, or an absolute Uri to return unmodified
Returns:
The combined Uri
static int Aurora.Framework.Extentions.CopyTo ( this Stream  copyFrom,
Stream  copyTo,
int  maximumBytesToCopy 
) [static]

Copies the contents of one stream to another, starting at the current position of each stream.

Parameters:
copyFrom The stream to copy from, at the position where copying should begin
copyTo The stream to copy to, at the position where bytes should be written
maximumBytesToCopy The maximum bytes to copy
Returns:
The total number of bytes copied

Copying begins at the streams' current positions. The positions are NOT reset after copying is complete.

static string Aurora.Framework.Extentions.GetStreamString ( this Stream  stream  )  [static]

Converts an entire stream to a string, regardless of current stream position.

Parameters:
stream The stream to convert to a string
Returns:

When this method is done, the stream position will be reset to its previous position before this method was called
